text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Today's 1,400-meter scrimmage has<n>begun! All eyes are
on Hishi Akebono<n>and Biko Pegasus!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Bono, you're really on fire today,<n>huh? Weeell, so am I!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono soars down the<n>course with explosive
speed. No one<n>would believe me if I told them about<n>the
day before.

text_block_list.name: Observing Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono's the big racer over<n>there, right? She always
makes the<n>tastiest food for everyone at the<n>dorms.

text_block_list.name: Observing Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's her! I knew she was<n>huge, but next to Biko
Pegasus, her<n>size is extra obvious!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
All right, the racers have entered the<n>homestretch! In the
lead is Hishi<n>Akebono, followed closely by Biko<n>Pegasus!
Will Hishi Akebono outrun<n>her, or will she be overtaken?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
(Huh? Why do my legs feel so<n>heavy... Ah, right, I didn't get
much<n>sleep last night.)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's it all right. But so what?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono's eyes sparkle as<n>she locks eyes with the
path ahead of<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, everybody, I'm giving<n>this race everything I
got!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: And no one can overtake me when I<n>give 100%!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
First to cross the finish line is Hishi<n>Akebono! Hishi
Akebono is our<n>winner! She managed to inch ahead<n>for a
narrow victory!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Yippee!

text_block_list.name: Fellow Racer
text_block_list.text: You really are a force to be reckonedwith on the track, Bono. You're such agentle giant, I sometimes forget the giant part.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. Well, it's a race, right? No<n>way I could smile after a
race where I<n>didn't give it my all. Isn't that right,<n>Biko? ♪

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
That's right! I know I'm in for a real<n>fight when you're in
the roster! ...But<n>losing still hurts!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Next time, victory will be mine! I<n>swear it!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! I thought you left to rest.<n>You didn't have to
come, but well,<n>thank you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Likewise, I'd like her to rest after this<n>race and the day we
had yesterday,<n>but before I can convey that thought...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
That reminds me! I'm having a<n>chanko party after this!
Would you like<n>to join us? ☆

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Come and get it, everybodyyy! I<n>promise the flavor is
super-duper<n>buono. ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After witnessing how Hishi Akebonoflitted about the kitchen just now, Iseriously wonder if her energy has any limit. Lured by the aroma,students steadily file into the cafeteria.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
That means you too, Trainer! I made<n>more than enough, so
be sure to eat<n>your fill.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: YUM! I could eat this all day!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ooh, you added ginger and perillaleaves to the fish balls... And it'sreal good. I'm stealin' that idea!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Seein' y'all sittin' 'round the table<n>and laughin' reminds
me of home!<n>This meal's delicious!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I-it really is... And the vegetables you<n>used are so hard to
come by.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Phew, everyone's got a bowl, right?<n>Then it's my turn to
dig iiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking down at my bowl, I recognize<n>some vegetables
inside. They look<n>just like the ones I dropped in the<n>river...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Mmm! Freshly picked veggies really<n>do make the best
stew.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I sure did. I mean, the whole<n>reason we were
collecting ingredients<n>yesterday was for this party.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
After all, I wanted to give my friends a<n>super-duper
scrumptious bowl of<n>chanko after a race.
choice_data_list: But why would you go so far...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Why? Because after giving your all,<n>you've gotta eat buono
food with your<n>friends!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Tracen is just like a sumo dojo,<n>Trainer! We only get
stronger when<n>we compete with everything we've<n>got!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking past Hishi Akebono, I notice<n>the content faces of
each of her<n>classmates as they chow down on<n>their
chanko.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Arrrgh! I was right theeere! A little<n>more, and I would've
won!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Don't get too down on yourself. You<n>showed some real
guts out there.<n>How about doing some stamina<n>training
with me?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Now that I think 'bout it, you've been<n>really goin' at it in the
mornings,<n>Suzuka. How far are you runnin'<n>these days?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ummm... To the closest mountain... I<n>think.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: What?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Hehe. ♪ I'm glad everyone's having<n>a good time.
choice_data_list:
(This must be what she meant by being a pot of
chanko.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She wants to be there for her<n>rivals—not just as fierce
competition,<n>but as a fellow racer to grow<n>alongside.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just like her, her ambitions are big<n>and good-natured.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the end though, there can be only<n>one winner. There may
come a time<n>when her ideals block her way<n>forward.
choice_data_list:
(I'll just have to be there for her when that
happens.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
More and more students stop by the<n>hot pot party, and the
festive<n>atmosphere continues until right<n>before curfew.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, Trainer, what's wrong?<n>You're really spacing out
today.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh? Where did that come from?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as Hishi Akebono desired, all the<n>students who came
to the hot pot<n>party left with a smile and a full belly.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If anyone can become a pot of<n>chanko and bring a smile of<n>
satisfaction to everyone else... it's<n>her.
choice_data_list: Your dreams have my full support.
Your dreams have my full support.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono's big, bright eyes<n>grow even bigger as I
continue.
choice_data_list: Let's turn you into a big pot of chanko.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... Okay! Thank you, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right! As thanks for tagging<n>along with me
yesterday, I baked you<n>some cookies!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I baked them with lots and lots of<n>love, so I can promise a
buono taste! ♪<n>Say "ah"!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I steel my resolve to make her<n>dreams come true,
starting with her<n>debut, I take a bite. My mouth fills<n>with a
soft, sweet warmth...
